name: AzureInvokeMethodOnDevice

metadata.description:
AzureInvokeMethodOnDevice Sensor


Invoke a function on an Azure connected device.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed

Raw Data
  • response (only returns on Success state)
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • methodName: The name of the function on the device which you would like to invoke
  • responseTimeoutInSeconds (optional): Max time to wait for a response. (in seconds) (default: 10)
  • deviceId: the device name registered on Azure
  • payload: The value to provide to the invoked function
  • CONNECTION_STRING: A valid Azure connection string

NOTE: Azure has three kinds of connection strings. You can read about the 'IoT Hub Connection String' property: use here
